ComicInfo.Series: Hellboy and the B.P.R.D.: 1955 - Occult Intelligence
ComicInfo.Summary:
The mystery in the tropics heats up when a monster attacks, but the creature may have ties to a secret weapon at the center of an international conflict. Elsewhere, Bruttenholm's own investigation suggests that the B.P.R.D. is embroiled in something much larger than he thought.
Brian Churilla returns for more Hellboy and the B.P.R.D.!
